TopicTitle: [Tip] How to change zoom in the VAB

Articles.Content:
Just keep shift pressed and roll your mouse wheel. It will change your zoom.

Just a quick tip which many people don't know about.

Now the only problem is the launch tower getting in the way of your massive ship. But there is a mod for everything.
